posts.title: First Post: Welcome to My Blog!
posts.author: margoira
posts.summary: First blog post introduction about myself and my interests.

content.text: Hello, everyone! This is my first blog post, and I'm thrilled to share a bit about myself and what you can expect from this blog. This blog is one of many projects that will continue to evolve over time. I'll be covering topics related to software development, computers, and components.

I work as a Cloud Developer at M-Files, I specialize in leveraging Azure cloud services, Durable Functions, and Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC). I focus on developing user interfaces using React and have extensive experience with containerization, Service Fabric, and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). On the backend, I utilize .NET for building robust APIs.
In my personal life, I have a passion for running and going to the gym, which keeps me energized and focused. I live in Pirkanmaa, Finland, with my two young children, a playful cat, and a loyal dog.

When I have some free time, I dive into the world of computers and enjoy working on small development projects. My interests include neural networks, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, with a special focus on image recognition. I also have a great time playing CodinGame and the strategy game Beyond All Reason.
On top of all that, I'm also an entrepreneur. In my side business, I build custom computers and sell IT equipment to companies. My company is called N-ele Oy.
Thank you for visiting my blog. I look forward to sharing more about my work, interests, and projects. Stay tuned for more updates!

posts.title: It's been a while?
posts.author: margoira
posts.summary: Second blog post reintroducing myself and my interests.

content.text: Good afternoon, it's friday finally. I have been quite busy at work and life in general, so I haven't had much time to write blog posts. But here I am, back again to share a bit what I've been up to and what you can expect from this blog.

At first...I started little pet project... well lets call it 'MakeHumanStrongAgain'. In general its a game, where you need to level up your own character by completing 'stuff' in real life. It is web service, but I like to classify it as a game. I have been working on it little by little, and I try to post update about it here in my blog.

Another thing I have been working is our company website. We used shopify, but because we are small company, we decided to move to simpler solution and much more cheaper solution. Basically it is static website, hosted in github pages. As it is static website, with minimal functionality, I coded it using plain html, css and little javascript.
When we deploy it to github pages, I will inform you all here in my blog.

As you can predict, Winter is coming. There is lot of good and bad things. Bad thing is that it takes lot of energy and time to dress up little kids and get them to daycare/outside to play etc. Good thing is that Ice Hockey season started! I like to watch Sm-liiga games, me and my daughter have been three times to see live games (Tampere Ilves). I also like to play ice hockey, and in this season I will play in Tampereen Dynamo. Today is game day, but unfortunately I'm sick...

What else...I still work at M-Files as Cloud Developer. In November I need to travel to Bangalore, India for two weeks for work. It's nice to see India. I have never been there before. Also I changed this blog's theme little bit. Now I will add these posts with .json files. Also little style changes with hero section + .js code.
